rows.PRODUCT PERSON — HIRING BRIEF: THE JOB
Build two sites in ~2 weeks:
SITE 1: IonWave DAO Spinoff Page (password-protected)
The site described in this spec. Password gate, hero, story, cast, system,
numbers, daily video feed, FAQ, apply/CTA. Consumer-grade quality.
The VA will update daily. You build it so she can.
SITE 2: DAO Infrastructure Company Page (public or password-protected)
The coordination hedgefund thesis. IonWave as proof. Tech roadmap.
Team. How to participate. This is the parent company investor page.
Both sites must feel like the same brand. Same design system. Same quality bar.
Reference: remedymeds.com for quality and direct response sensibility.
Think: if Remedy made a venture studio site.
REQUIREMENTS
Technical:
• Next.js or equivalent (fast, SEO-ready, component-based)
• CMS for VA to post daily updates (video + text) without touching code
• Password gate with tier support (1 password or multiple tiers TBD)
• Video hosting (Mux, Cloudflare Stream, or Vimeo OTT — not YouTube)
• Mobile-first responsive design
• Fast (<2s load, optimized video streaming)
Design:
• Consumer-grade — must pass the 'would I show this to a stranger' test
• Cinematic feel — full-bleed video, dramatic typography, intentional whitespace
• Direct response elements — social proof counters, authority badges, CTAs, FAQ
• Brand system — logo, color palette, typography, components reusable across both sites
• No templates. No WordPress themes. Custom.
Content management:
• VA can upload video + write 1-line summary without developer help
• Cast page editable (add new character, update photo, mark role as filled)
• Stats/counters update easily (Day X, team count, expert count)
• FAQ expandable without code changes
WHO THIS PERSON IS
Not just a developer. Not just a designer. A product person.
They need:
• Design sensibility (portfolio of consumer-grade work, not enterprise dashboards)
• Frontend engineering (can build it themselves, not just design in Figma)
• Speed (2 weeks to two production-quality sites is aggressive but doable)
• Taste (knows the difference between 'good enough' and 'actually good')
Where to find them:
• Contra, Toptal, or curated freelance networks
• Indie hackers who have shipped beautiful consumer products
• Design engineers (the hybrid role that's increasingly common)
Compensation:
• Contract fee ($3-8K for both sites, depending on talent level)
• Small equity in IonWave (0.5-1%) if they're exceptional and want ongoing involvement
• Portfolio piece: 'I built the launch infrastructure for a YC-backed venture studio'
DELIVERABLES & TIMELINE
Day

rows.col_2: Brand system: logo, colors, typography, component library. Design comps for 3 key pages (Home, Cast, Daily Update).
Password gate + Home/Hero page live. Video hosting configured. VA can test upload.
Story page + Cast page + Daily Update feed live. CMS working. VA does first real update.
System page + Numbers page + FAQ + Apply/CTA. Full Site 1 complete.
Site 2 (infrastructure company page). Same design system, different content.
QA, mobile testing, speed optimization, final polish. Both sites live.
